text:
“Pyotr Petrovitch,” Katerina Ivanovna cried, “protect me! Make her understand!” 

“Allow me, madam,” he interrupted, waving her off. 

“Your papa, as you know, I didn’t have the honor of knowing.” Someone laughed. 

“I’m not part of your squabbles with Amalia Ivanovna. I want to speak with Sofya.” 

He edged past her, moving towards Sonia. 

Katerina stood frozen, thunderstruck. 

“How can he deny my father’s hospitality?” she thought. 

His tone was cold, contemptuous. The room fell silent.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Katerina Ivanovna is bewildered by Pyotr Petrovitch's dismissive attitude towards her and her family's misfortunes.
